title: Alpha Marine
author: Alpha Marine
content: We all wish life was easier, but it's not so we've got to make do with what we have.The degree you want, the career you want, and the business you dream to have won't come easy. I'm of the notion that life doesn't want you to succeed. If you run away from every obstacle then you will never achieve your goal.I keep seeing forum members make complaints about not getting merits and all. It will be very hypocritical of me to say we shouldn't care about merit and ranking up, but your desire to rank up should lead you in the right direction. The goal is to learn and grow, then make meaningful contributions that can grow other forum members. It's not going to be easy, and it will take time, but it will be worth it in the end. This doesn't only apply to the forum but to every aspect of life.Take a business for example. The goal of a business is to make a profit but you can't make a profit if certain things are not done right. If you just pursue profit without thinking about other factors, your business will fail.If your product/service is top-notch, your marketing, packaging, and distribution are done right along with other factors, you will make a profit.The same thing applies to every aspect of life. A degree, career, or anything at all. If your first encounter with crypto was a scam altcoin, it doesn't mean you should wash your hand off of crypto. If you're still interested in it, learn from that bad situation and gain more experience from it. If you previously made an investment in Bitcoin and you lost, it doesn't mean you should give up on Bitcoin; learn from it and re-evaluate your decision. So don't think Bitcoin and Bitcointalk are any different from life. You may look at a forum member with legendary rank and you want to achieve that, it's good that that motivates you, but you have to know that they didn't just achieve that overnight. They learned, grew, improved themselves, and improved others to get to that level.Whatever you want, work hard and smart for it because it won't be handed to you on a platter.

You may look at a forum member with legendary rank and you want to achieve that, it's good that that motivates you, but you have to know that they didn't just achieve that overnight. They learned, grew, improved themselves, and improved others to get to that level.Whatever you want, work hard and smart for it because it won't be handed to you on a platter.  It is not easy to form a consistent attitude in pursuing what you want because there is a level of boredom when you don't get it. Conversely, excessive expectations can cause a person to experience a level of saturation and eventually have to stop. Doing something is not easy and we need to see a way to achieve it and most importantly don't think too much about big targets and do it in a relaxed manner by continuing to gain knowledge, slowly we will arrive at the target we want.Everyone's abilities are certainly different, but everyone can achieve their desires in their own way. Get to know your own abilities, continue to increase knowledge by reading and stay optimistic by maintaining consistency, that's how we will draw conclusions about what we want to pursue.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: You speak well, but it hasn't always been simple, especially for young men and boys these days. If you're a man and you don't have money or any other sources of income, people will think you're useless and even some of your family members will think you're lazy because you didn't go to work or find something that will put money in your pocket. As a man or person who is willing to improve his life or build something that will make him happy in the future, you must try and never give up on everything you are witnessing because to succeed in life, you will encounter many things that you could never have imagined in your life.There are many people in the forum today who, when asked how long they were in the forum before getting to the stage or the rank they are today, are unable to explain it because they were patients for a very long time before getting there. Attending the forum is not something that you think you start getting when you come, like merit or start making it in. So, my recommendation to every new member of the forum or any member of the forum who is grumbling about how to acquire merit or he or she wants to rank is to bear in mind that everything in the forum is to be patient and even investing is to have patience, Patience is the best key for everyone in life.

comments.body: But think about this: Despite being genuine, life's challenges might not always be a sign that it doesn't want you to succeed. Instead, growth occurs as a result of a path of learning and earning. People don't just develop by juggling through hoops; they also grow by steadily ascending a stairway. Despite the fact that they have nothing to do with growth, people frequently ascend stairsYes, failure contributes to learning in terms of Bitcoin and Bitcointalk. Trees and Bitcoin both have growth rings that indicate age and periods of abundance and scarcity. So even if your cryptocurrency interactions are unsuccessful, like an unwatered plant, you must keep trying, keep learning, and keep believing in Bitcoin, lettuce, or any other produce

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Life is like that. As bittersweet as it is it cannot be all success. Sometimes despite having the drive, inspiration, and motivation to work and invest things just don't always go the way we expect and want them to. There will be struggles along the way, there will be obstacles that will make us want to just drop everything and quit. However, sometimes all we can do during those hard days is grit our teeth and push forward, may it be by continuing and hoping for the best or quitting to open new opportunities. Life goes on, and so will the struggles and failures but no one succeeds sweetly without those bitter times.
